meanings.definition: To transfer (something) together with another person or group.
meanings.sent1: We are cotransferring the boxes to the new office.
meanings.sent2: The team is cotransferring the responsibility for the project.
meanings.sent3: The friends were cotransferring snacks at the picnic.
meanings.sent4: She and her brother cotransferred their toys to the donation center.
meanings.sent5: Cotransferring the books made the task quicker and more fun.

meanings.definition: The act of transferring something together with another person or group.
meanings.sent1: Cotransferring requires good communication between all parties involved.
meanings.sent2: The cotransferring of knowledge is essential for collaboration.
meanings.sent3: The cotransferring of gifts at the party was a delightful sight.
meanings.sent4: In teamwork, cotransferring responsibilities lightens the load for everyone.
meanings.sent5: The success of the project depended on the smooth cotransferring of resources.
